awd_titl_txt: NBER Annual Macroeconomics Conference to be held in Boston, MA, 1994-1996
awd_abstract_narration: 930964  Fischer  This grant provides continued support for a series of annual        conferences on macroeconomics.  Past conferences have made a  significant contribution to the testing of empirical implications  of new theories as well as the use of relevant theory to analyze  policy issues of current interest.  The conference series will  continue to encourage the writing of empirically oriented papers  by both established and promising young economists.  In addition,  the series will continue to serve as a forum for communication  among economists from the different schools of macroeconomic  thought.  The annual conference volume has become a widely cited  and influential research reference.  ***
